languages.text: {n}Взгляд Абеляра упирается в вас, и из него исчезают даже намеки на сдержанность.{/n} "Ну как, вы довольны "расследованием", Лорд-капитан?"
{n}Abelard looks at you, and his last vestiges of restraint vanish.{/n} "Well, are you pleased with your 'investigation,' Lord Captain?"
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Абеляра упирается в вас, и из него исчезают даже намеки на сдержанность.{/n} "Ну как, вы довольны "расследованием", Лорд-капитан?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard turns his gaze on you, and his last vestiges of restraint vanish.{/n} "Well, are you pleased with your 'investigation,' Lord Captain?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德盯着你，最后一丝克制也消失了。{/n}“那么，您对您的‘调查’结果还满意吗，舰长大人？”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you, and his last vestiges of restraint vanish.{/n} "Well, are you pleased with your 'investigation,' Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德盯着你，最后一丝克制也消失了。{/n}“那么，您对您的‘调查’结果还满意吗，舰长大人？”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard te mira fijamente y los últimos restos de su autocontrol se desvanecen.{/n} «Bueno, ¿está satisfech{mf|o|a} con su "investigación", Lord Capitán?».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you, and his last vestiges of restraint vanish.{/n} "Well, are you pleased with your 'investigation,' Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard te mira fijamente y los últimos restos de su autocontrol se desvanecen.{/n} «Bueno, ¿está satisfech{mf|o|a} con su "investigación", Lord Capitán?».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはあなたを見ると、その最後の自制が消え去った。{/n}「さて、『調査』にはご満足いただけましたか、ロード・キャプテン？」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you, and his last vestiges of restraint vanish.{/n} "Well, are you pleased with your 'investigation,' Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはあなたを見ると、その最後の自制が消え去った。{/n}「さて、『調査』にはご満足いただけましたか、ロード・キャプテン？」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard blickt dich an, und seine letzten Reste Zurückhaltung verschwinden.{/n} "Nun, seid Ihr zufrieden mit Eurer 'Untersuchung,' Lord Captain?"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you, and his last vestiges of restraint vanish.{/n} "Well, are you pleased with your 'investigation,' Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard blickt dich an, und seine letzten Reste Zurückhaltung verschwinden.{/n} "Nun, seid Ihr zufrieden mit Eurer 'Untersuchung,' Lord Captain?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard se tourne vers vous et renonce à sa retenue habituelle pour laisser libre cours à sa colère.{/n} « Eh bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, êtes-vous {mf|satisfait|satisfaite} de votre "enquête" ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you, and his last vestiges of restraint vanish.{/n} "Well, are you pleased with your 'investigation,' Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard se tourne vers vous et renonce à sa retenue habituelle pour laisser libre cours à sa colère.{/n} « Eh bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, êtes-vous {mf|satisfait|satisfaite} de votre "enquête" ? »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, bakışlarını sana çeviriyor. O anda tutumu birden değişiyor.{/n} "Ee, 'soruşturmanız' sonuç verdi mi Lord Kaptan?"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you, and his last vestiges of restraint vanish.{/n} "Well, are you pleased with your 'investigation,' Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, bakışlarını sana çeviriyor. O anda tutumu birden değişiyor.{/n} "Ee, 'soruşturmanız' sonuç verdi mi Lord Kaptan?"
